ADDomain.title: ADDomain
ADDomain.description: Defines the AD domain you’re working with.

AutoConfigure.title: AutoConfigure
AutoConfigure.description: Keyword to determine what auto configuration scheme to use.

AutoRenewCert.title: AutoRenewCert
AutoRenewCert.description: Sets the number of days to go on a cert before automatically renewing it.

CaribouTime.title: CaribouTime
CaribouTime.description: Changes the icon set to Carrie the Caribou

ChangePasswordCommand.title: ChangePasswordCommand
ChangePasswordCommand.description: Script or other binary to run when a password is sucessfully changed.

ChangePasswordOptions.title: ChangePasswordOptions
ChangePasswordOptions.description: Task, URL or App path for ChangePasswordType (<<serial>>, <<fullname>>, <<shortname>> and <<domain>> are currently supported as substitutions).

ChangePasswordType.title: ChangePasswordType
ChangePasswordType.description: Determines type of ChangePassword function (Kerberos, Task, URL, App, and None are currently supported).

CleanCerts.title: CleanCerts
CleanCerts.description: Determines if NoMAD should remove extra certs from user’s Keychain. This will leave the 2 newest and the 2 oldest certs in the keychian.

ConfigureChrome.title: ConfigureChrome
ConfigureChrome.description: Tells NoMAD to update your Chrome settings to allow for Kerberos auth with your AD domain.

ConfigureChromeDomain.title: ConfigureChromeDomain
ConfigureChromeDomain.description: Tells NoMAD to update your Chrome settings to allow for Kerberos auth with for the set domain. This allows for Chrome to work with domains other than your AD Domain. Note that the domain will be automatically wildcarded, so setting a domain of “nomad.test” will result in *nomad.test being set. Multiple domains are supported, seperate them by “,”.

CustomLDAPAttributes.title: CustomLDAPAttributes
CustomLDAPAttributes.description: List of custom attributes to query in AD on each user record lookup. Attributes will be written back to the UserAttributes key.

DontMatchKerbPrefs.title: DontMatchKerbPrefs
DontMatchKerbPrefs.description: Determines if the kasspwd server is written out to the com.apple.Kerberos preference domain.

DontShowWelcome.title: DontShowWelcome
DontShowWelcome.description: Determines if the Welcome window is shown on first launch.

DontShowWelcomeDefaultOn.title: DontShowWelcomeDefaultOn
DontShowWelcomeDefaultOn.description: Shows the Welcome Screen, but checks the “Don’t show again” box by default. Useful for when you want to show the Welcome screen only once.

ExportableKey.title: ExportableKey
ExportableKey.description: Determines if the private key from any generate certs can be exported.

GetCertificateAutomatically.title: GetCertificateAutomatically
GetCertificateAutomatically.description: Determines if a certificate is automatically requested for a user when they don’t have a valid existing certificate.

GetHelpOptions.title: GetHelpOptions
GetHelpOptions.description: URL or Path for GetHelpType (<<serial>>, <<fullname>>, <<shortname>> and <<domain>> are currently supported as substitutions).

GetHelpType.title: GetHelpType
GetHelpType.description: Determines type of GetHelp function (Bomgar, URL and App are currently supported).

HicFix.title: HicFix
HicFix.description: Enables a secondary password change with AD to fix an issue with macOS 10.13.0 with AD-bound mobile accounts.

HideAbout.title: HideAbout
HideAbout.description: Removes the About menu from NoMAD.

HideExpiration.title: HideExpiration
HideExpiration.description: Hides the password countdown display in the menu bar.

HideExpirationMessage.title: HideExpirationMessage
HideExpirationMessage.description: Specifies text to show in the menu bar when the password countdown has been suppressed.

HideGetSoftware.title: HideGetSoftware
HideGetSoftware.description: Determines if the Get Software menu is visible.

HideHelp.title: HideHelp
HideHelp.description: Determines if the Get Help menu is visible.

HideLockScreen.title: HideLockScreen
HideLockScreen.description: Determines if the Lock Screen menu is visible.

HidePrefs.title: HidePrefs
HidePrefs.description: Prevents the Preferences menu from being accessible.

HideRenew.title: HideRenew
HideRenew.description: Determines if the Renew Tickets menu is visible.

HideSignOut.title: HideSignOut
HideSignOut.description: Determines if the Sign Out menu is visible.

HideQuit.title: HideQuit
HideQuit.description: Determines if the Quit menu is visible.

HomeAppendDomain.title: HomeAppendDomain
HomeAppendDomain.description: Adds your AD domain to the end of the user’s hold folder. Used for when the home in AD is not fully qualified.

IconOff.title: IconOff
IconOff.description: Specifies an icon file to use for when NoMAD is not connected. Note: this needs to be a 16×16 image to display correctly.

IconOffDark.title: IconOffDark
IconOffDark.description: Specifies an icon file to use for when NoMAD is not connected in dark mode.Note: this needs to be a 16×16 image to display correctly.

IconOn.title: IconOn
IconOn.description: Specifies an icon file to use for when NoMAD is connected. Note: this needs to be a 16×16 image to display correctly.

IconOnDark.title: IconOnDark
IconOnDark.description: Specifies an icon file to use for when NoMAD is connected in dark mode. Note: this needs to be a 16×16 image to display correctly.

KeychainItems.title: KeychainItems
KeychainItems.description: A Dictionary or Keychain Items matching an item name to an account name. On password change, NoMAD will update these items with the user’s new password.

KeychainItemsDebug.title: KeychainItemsDebug
KeychainItemsDebug.description: Enbables KeychainItems debugging. Will attempt to update passwords on any sign in through the NoMAD UI and log verbosely as to what’s not working.

LDAPAnonymous.title: LDAPAnonymous
LDAPAnonymous.description: Determines if NoMAD uses anonymous LDAP binding when getting the user record.

LDAPServerList.title: LDAPServerList
LDAPServerList.description: List of LDAP servers for NoMAD to use instead of doing SRV lookups.

LDAPOnly.title: LDAPOnly
LDAPOnly.description: Sets NoMAD to treat the remote server as just an LDAP server and not specifically AD.

LDAPOverSSL.title: LDAPOverSSL
LDAPOverSSL.description: Determines if NoMAD uses LDAP over SSL.

LDAPType.title: LDAPType
LDAPType.description: An indication of what specific LDAP type is in use. Currently only “OD” for Apple’s Open Directory is available.

LightsOutIKnowWhatImDoing.title: LightsOutIKnowWhatImDoing
LightsOutIKnowWhatImDoing.description: Removes the icon from the menu bar. Note that NoMAD still is in the menu bar, just with no icon and taking up less space.

LocalPasswordSync.title: LocalPasswordSync
LocalPasswordSync.description: Determines if we keep the local password in sync with the network password or not.

LocalPasswordSyncDontSyncLocalUsers.title: LocalPasswordSyncDontSyncLocalUsers
LocalPasswordSyncDontSyncLocalUsers.description: An array of user names that if they match the current local user, NoMAD won’t synchronize the password regardless of what user logs into AD.

LocalPasswordSyncDontSyncNetworkUsers.title: LocalPasswordSyncDontSyncNetworkUsers
LocalPasswordSyncDontSyncNetworkUsers.description: An array of user names that if they match the AD user signing in, NoMAD won’t synchronize the password regardless of what user logs into AD.

LocalPasswordSyncOnMatchOnly.title: LocalPasswordSyncOnMatchOnly
LocalPasswordSyncOnMatchOnly.description: Determines if the domain password will be synced to the local account only when the account names match.

LoginItem.title: LoginItem
LoginItem.description: Determines whether or not to add NoMAD to the user’s start up items.

MenuAbout.title: MenuAbout
MenuAbout.description: Determines the name of the About menu item.

MenuChangePassword.title: MenuChangePassword
MenuChangePassword.description: Changes the menu text of the Change Password menu item.

MenuGetCertificate.title: MenuGetCertificate
MenuGetCertificate.description: Changes the menu text of the Get Certificate menu item.

MenuHomeDirectory.title: MenuHomeDirectory
MenuHomeDirectory.description: Changes the menu text of the Home Directory menu item.

MenuGetHelp.title: MenuGetHelp
MenuGetHelp.description: Changes the menu text of the Get Help menu item.

MenuGetSoftware.title: MenuGetSoftware
MenuGetSoftware.description: Changes the menu text of the Software menu item.

MenuFileServers.title: MenuFileServers
MenuFileServers.description: Changes the menu text of the File Servers menu.

MenuPasswordExpires.title: MenuPasswordExpires
MenuPasswordExpires.description: Changes the menu text of the password expiration menu item before a user logs in.

MenuRenewTickets.title: MenuRenewTickets
MenuRenewTickets.description: Changes the menu text of the Renew Tickets menu item.

MenuUserName.title: MenuUserName
MenuUserName.description: Changes the menu text of the user name menu item before a user logs in.

MenuWelcome.title: MenuWelcome
MenuWelcome.description: Path to a folder enclosing an index.html file and associated resources for displaying as a Welcome screen when running NoMAD.

MessageLocalSync.title: MessageLocalSync
MessageLocalSync.description: Message text for when a user is asked for their local password to sync their network password to their local account.

MessageNotConnected.title: MessageNotConnected
MessageNotConnected.description: The text in the menu bar to display when NoMAD is not connected to the AD domain.

MessagePasswordChangePolicy.title: MessagePasswordChangePolicy
MessagePasswordChangePolicy.description: Message text to display in the password change dialog to help the user understand how complext they need to be.

MessageUPCAlert.title: MessageUPCAlert
MessageUPCAlert.description: Message to be shown in an UPCAlert notification.

MountSharesWithFinder.title: MountSharesWithFinder
MountSharesWithFinder.description: When file shares are set to automount, this mounts them via the Finder instead of via the API.

PasswordExpireAlertTime.title: PasswordExpireAlertTime
PasswordExpireAlertTime.description: The threshold, in seconds, for when to start notifying the user about their expiring password – set to 0 to never be bothered, and defaults to 15 days or 1,296,000 seconds.

PasswordExpireCustomAlert.title: PasswordExpireCustomAlert
PasswordExpireCustomAlert.description: Custom alert to show in the menu bar instead of days to go.

PasswordExpireCustomWarnTime.title: PasswordExpireCustomWarnTime
PasswordExpireCustomWarnTime.description: Will cause the custom alert to be only shown at a specific threshold, and in yellow.

PasswordExpireCustomAlertTime.title: PasswordExpireCustomAlertTime
PasswordExpireCustomAlertTime.description: Will cause the custom alert to be only shown at a specific threshold, and in red.

PasswordPolicy.title: PasswordPolicy
PasswordPolicy.description: Will show visual indicators to the user when changing his or her password that it does not meet policy. Note: the values need to be set as Strings in your dictionary.

PersistExpiration.title: PersistExpiration
PersistExpiration.description: Setting this to true will display the password expiration countdown even when the user is not logged into the domain.

RecursiveGroupLookup.title: RecursiveGroupLookup
RecursiveGroupLookup.description: Allows for recursive group lookups in AD to find all nested groups a user may be a member of.

RenewTickets.title: RenewTickets
RenewTickets.description: Setting to determine if auto ticket renewal is used.

SecondsToRenew.title: SecondsToRenew
SecondsToRenew.description: Setting for how often to renew tickets.

SelfServicePath.title: SelfServicePath
SelfServicePath.description: Sets a path for an application to be used with the Get Software menu item.

ShowHome.title: ShowHome
ShowHome.description: Determines whether the AD home share is shown in the menu.

SignInCommand.title: SignInCommand
SignInCommand.description: Script or command to be run when NoMAD completes a successful sign in to AD.

SignInWindowAlert.title: SignInWindowAlert
SignInWindowAlert.description: Makes the NoMAD Sign In window the foremost window when a user is not signed in.

SignInWindowAlertTime.title: SignInWindowAlertTime
SignInWindowAlertTime.description: Seconds between the SignInWindowAlert making the Sign In window the foremost window.

SignInWindowOnLaunch.title: SignInWindowOnLaunch
SignInWindowOnLaunch.description: This will force the Sign In window to display when NoMAD launches.

SignInWindowOnLaunchExclusions.title: SignInWindowOnLaunchExclusions
SignInWindowOnLaunchExclusions.description: An array of strings for local users that will not be shown the Sign In window automatically.

SignOutCommand.title: SignOutCommand
SignOutCommand.description: Path to a script or other binary to execute on sign out.

StateChangeAction.title: StateChangeAction
StateChangeAction.description: Path to a script that will be launched on network changes.

Template.title: Template
Template.description: The certificate template that you’d like to request when using the Windows CA.

TitleSignIn.title: TitleSignIn
TitleSignIn.description: Changes the title of the sign in window.

UPCAlert.title: UPCAlert
UPCAlert.description: Determines if NoMAD will alert the user to Unannounced Password Changes, typically when the password was changed in AD and not from the user’s system.

UPCAlertAction.title: UPCAlertAction
UPCAlertAction.description: Path to a script or other binary to execute when a UPC Alert occurs.

UseKeychain.title: UseKeychain
UseKeychain.description: Determines whether to store the Kerberos password in the user’s keychain.

UseKeychainPrompt.title: UseKeychainPrompt
UseKeychainPrompt.description: Will cause NoMAD to force a sign in to NoMAD to caputre the password in the Keychain.

UserSwitch.title: UserSwitch
UserSwitch.description: Ensures that the local user name is the active ticket being used by NoMAD.

WifiNetworks.title: WifiNetworks
WifiNetworks.description: SSIDs of wireless networks you would like to associate any certificates created with NoMAD to via an identity preference in the Keychain.

X509CA.title: X509CA
X509CA.description: FQDN of the Windows web Certificate Authority you would like to use.
